I

initboard() - Static method in class chess.Chess
initboard is a function to setup the board with the pieces on it.
isBishopPathEmpty(String, String) - Static method in class pieces.Queen
isBishopPathEmpty is a helper for isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Queen to implement Rook move from its src to its destination.
isBlackBox(char, int) - Static method in class chess.Chess
isBlackBox is to check if a box on the board is a black box or not.
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Bishop
isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Bishop.
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.King
isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for King.
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Knight
isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Knight.
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Pawn
isMoveValid takes in the src, destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Pawn(1 sq at a time or 2 sqs at first time).
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Piece
isMoveValid function to check if the Piece can move from one pos to another, it is extended to the subclasses to check for the valid move of that particular Piece.
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Queen
isMoveValid takes in the src,destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Queen.
isMoveValid(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Rook
isMoveValid takes in the src,destination of the piece's move and returns true if it is a valid move for Rook.
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Bishop
isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Bishop to move from its src to its destination.
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.King
 
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Knight
 
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Pawn
isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Pawn to move from its src to its destination.
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Piece
isPathEmpty function to check if the path b/w the src and dest is empty, it is extended by the subclasses to check their own paths.
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Queen
isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Queen to move from its src to its destination.
isPathEmpty(String, String) - Method in class pieces.Rook
isPathEmpty checks if the path is clear for the Rook to move from its src to its destination.
isRookPathEmpty(String, String) - Static method in class pieces.Queen
isRookPathEmpty is a helper for isPathEmpty and it checks if the path is clear for the Queen to implement Rook move from its src to its destination.
